review_data.title: fein, frisch und freundlich

review_data.title: sehr gutes Essen
review_data.content: freundliches personal, authentisches essen. schöne einrichtung, gute preise und sehr leckeres essen.

review_data.title: Tops three Chinese!
review_data.content: This restaurant is in the top three best Chinese restaurants I’ve been to. I stopped in on a lark and the earnestness of the family who owned and operated, the fantastic food the fresh ingredients and the obvious pride of ownership and delivery made this...More

review_data.title: Great authentic Chinese food
review_data.content: One of our best finds during the trip! Food is authentic, service is great and place is clean. Chef and service staff are warm and welcoming.

review_data.title: Authentisches Essen
review_data.content: sehr lecker guete bedienung freundlicher familien betrieb preisleistungs verhältnis top 5 verschiedene mittags menu mit suppe und salat

review_data.title: Bestes chinesische Restaurant
review_data.content: Sehr köstliches, frisch zubereitetes Essen, sodass über den Appetit hinaus gegessen wird. Falls es doch zu viel ist, besteht auch...More

review_data.title: Great Chinese meal in Zurich!
review_data.content: This is by far our best Chinese restaurant in Switzerland. The chef himself is super friendly and very kind! The food are so authentic and yummy ! Recommend this place to any traveller nearby here :)

review_data.title: Lunch after work
review_data.content: This restaurant is great. Place is clean. The service is good and the Chinese people who work there is friendly. My favorite menu here in the Lunch time is (Ente) Grilled Duck with vegetable. It’s so delicious and crispy. Recommended 😋

review_data.title: Toll
review_data.content: Finde es super dort geh sehr gerne in dieses Restaurant. Sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter und der Chef ist auch sehr herzlich

review_data.title: Das Allerbeste Chinarestaurant in Zürich! Absolute Spitzenklasse!

review_data.title: Super
review_data.content: Schon seit langem nicht mehr so gutes Chinesisches Essen gehabt! Schnell, lecker und das Preis/Leistungsverhältnis stimmt! Ambiente etwas kühl, aber...More

review_data.title: Tasty and authentic
review_data.content: Its difficult to find good, authentic Chinese food in Switzerland. The atmosphere was nice, the prices reasonable, and the service was excellent. Very good hospitality and great food coming from the kitchen - looking forward to dining here again.

review_data.title: Tastes Like I Imagine Chinese Home Cooking
review_data.content: I was here a few times and the food was always very good. Over Lunchtime they offer a prepared Lunch-Menu for good value. Otherwise you can order from the card and the food is then freshly prepared for you. It Always tasted very good and...More

review_data.title: Essen wie in China
review_data.content: Wem der übliche Einheitsgeschmack chinesischer Restaurants in der Schweiz nicht schmeckt, sollte hier essen gehen. Da schmeckt jedes Gericht wirklich...More

review_data.title: Schneller Service, guter Preis
review_data.content: Das Preis-Leitsungsverhältnis ist gut. Der Service läuft zügig, idal wenn man nur wenig Zeit zur Verfügung hat.

review_data.title: Beste Chinesische Restaurant in Zürich
review_data.content: Seit über sechs jahren stammgast.Essen ausgezeichnet.Personal sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.Schöne ambiente.Nur 10 meter von Tram 14 haltestelle "felsenrainstrasse". Das beste...More

review_data.title: Not your typical Chinese Restaurant
review_data.content: i am a picky eater and being chinese coming from southeast asia, our tastebuds are somehow more flavourful and more fusion. this is by far the best chinese restaurant... not the typical chinese restaurant manned by chinese mainlander and cook in a so-so-la-la manner. tasted...More
